dialog.text: Jeff recommended this great YouTube channel all about CSS - Kevin Powell.   Watched loads in one go last night.  I still not idea how to write this stuff, but I can kinda figure my way around now.  Have you heard of him?

Alexander said they had him to speak last year which is really cool.   Boyfriend got really pissed at me last night for ignoring him though.  When I wouldn't watch a film with him he put his console on full blast in our tiny flat :angry:  Anyway, enough about me - how's your stuff going?

joins.text: It's not going great for me either.

dialog.text: I hope you are making more sense of this stuff than I am! Anyway, got to run - team meeting :smiley:
